#### Tender Details

* Closing Date: February 14, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: N/A
* Expected Contract End Date: October 5, 2023
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Procurement Category
* Category: Goods and Services (Procurement Category: Band-GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

#### Description
The Administrative Tribunals Support Service of Canada (ATSSC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply, delivery, integration, and installation of a fully functional audiovisual system for three Hearing rooms in Ottawa, Ontario, with options for four additional Hearings rooms prior to March 31, 2026. The system must meet specific security requirements. A mandatory site visit is scheduled for December 19, 2022, and interested bidders must submit their requests by December 16, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST).
